text: @RandPaul OMG you’re a dumbass! Ppl r not being quarantined for being Christian, it’s to keep them safe, you rotten piece of shit. Yeah, this coming from the person who went about his business having COVID-19 while waiting for your test results!!! 🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼
